mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(noticeno, adminno, ntitle, ncontent, passwd, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, rdate) VALUES(notice_seq.nextval, #{adminno}, #{ntitle}, #{ncontent}, #{passwd}, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT noticeno, adminno, ntitle, ncontent, passwd, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, views, youtube FROM notice ORDER BY noticeno DESC
